window.RSIW = window.RSIW===undefined ? window.innerWidth : window.RSIW;
window.RSIH = window.RSIH===undefined ? window.innerHeight : window.RSIH;
try {
var pw = document.getElementById(e.c).parentNode.offsetWidth,
newh;
pw = pw===0 || isNaN(pw) || (e.l=="fullwidth" || e.layout=="fullwidth") ? window.RSIW : pw;
e.tabw = e.tabw===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.tabw);
e.thumbw = e.thumbw===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.thumbw);
e.tabh = e.tabh===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.tabh);
e.thumbh = e.thumbh===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.thumbh);
e.tabhide = e.tabhide===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.tabhide);
e.thumbhide = e.thumbhide===undefined ? 0 : parseInt(e.thumbhide);
e.mh = e.mh===undefined || e.mh=="" || e.mh==="auto" ? 0 : parseInt(e.mh,0);
if(e.layout==="fullscreen" || e.l==="fullscreen")
newh = Math.max(e.mh,window.RSIH);
else{
e.gw = Array.isArray(e.gw) ? e.gw : [e.gw];
for (var i in e.rl) if (e.gw[i]===undefined || e.gw[i]===0) e.gw[i] = e.gw[i-1];
e.gh = e.el===undefined || e.el==="" || (Array.isArray(e.el) && e.el.length==0)? e.gh : e.el;
e.gh = Array.isArray(e.gh) ? e.gh : [e.gh];
for (var i in e.rl) if (e.gh[i]===undefined || e.gh[i]===0) e.gh[i] = e.gh[i-1];
var nl = new Array(e.rl.length),
ix = 0,
sl;
e.tabw = e.tabhide>=pw ? 0 : e.tabw;
e.thumbw = e.thumbhide>=pw ? 0 : e.thumbw;
e.tabh = e.tabhide>=pw ? 0 : e.tabh;
e.thumbh = e.thumbhide>=pw ? 0 : e.thumbh;
for (var i in e.rl) nl[i] = e.rl[i]<window.RSIW ? 0 : e.rl[i];
sl = nl[0];
for (var i in nl) if (sl>nl[i] && nl[i]>0) { sl = nl[i]; ix=i;}
var m = pw>(e.gw[ix]+e.tabw+e.thumbw) ? 1 : (pw-(e.tabw+e.thumbw)) / (e.gw[ix]);
newh =  (e.gh[ix] * m) + (e.tabh + e.thumbh);
}
var el = document.getElementById(e.c);
if (el!==null && el) el.style.height = newh+"px";
el = document.getElementById(e.c+"_wrapper");
if (el!==null && el) {
el.style.height = newh+"px";
el.style.display = "block";
}
} catch(e){

  Testimonials 		 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Distinguished Guests 		 
 
 
 
 The University hosts eminent personalities, experts, and persons of renown from diverse fields periodically to expand the worldview of the students and faculty. Listen in to their views and insights about Presidency University. 						 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 students 		 
 
 
 
 Curious to know about the quality of the learning environment, support from faculty, and academic and extracurricular activities on campus? Hear it from the students themselves. What is it like to be a student at Presidency University? 						 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 			 
 
 			 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Alumni 		 
 
 
 
 We may go anywhere in this wide world and do whatever we want, but the spirit of our alma mater remains strong with us. Any institutions’ alumni are key to its growth . – Shiv Nadar

.side-menu-wrapper{
position: fixed;
top: 0px;
left: calc(100% - 220px);
z-index: 999;
transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
height: 100%;
}
.side-menu-wrapper.opensidemenu{
left: calc(100% - 460px);
}
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger{
}
/* .side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger.active i.fas:before{
content: "\f00d";
} */
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav{
position: relative;
top: 35%;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-content{
min-width: 280px;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger {
display: flex;
justify-content: space-between;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .elementor-container,
.side-menu-wrapper .elementor-widget-eael-adv-tabs,
.side-menu-wrapper .elementor-widget-eael-adv-tabs .elementor-widget-container,
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-advance-tabs{
height: 100%;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:first-child{
margin-bottom: 5px;
background-color:#182F63 !important;
justify-content:center;
padding:5px !important;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:first-child span.eael-tab-title{
display: block;
color: #fff;
padding-top: 45px;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:first-child img{
width: auto !important;
height: 45px;
position: absolute;
top: 5px;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:last-child{
margin-top: 5px;
background-color:#073d67 !important;
color:#fff !important;
padding: 5px 10px !important;
justify-content: center;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:last-child span.eael-tab-title{
font-size: 16px;
font-weight: bold;
margin: 0;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:last-child span.eael-tab-title span{
font-size: 14px;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-content ul.soee{
}
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-content ul.soee li.p1{
background-color:transparent !important;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-content ul.soee li a{
color: #fff;
text-transform: uppercase;
letter-spacing: 1px;
font-size: 12px;
line-height: 24px;
text-decoration: none;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .close-navigation-menu{
color: #fff;
position: absolute;
left: -30px;
top: 0;
background: #182f63;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .close-navigation-menu .fas{
padding: 10px;
cursor: pointer;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .close-navigation-menu .fa-chevron-left{
display:none;
}
.side-menu-wrapper.closemenu .close-navigation-menu .fa-chevron-left{
display:block;
}
.side-menu-wrapper.closemenu .close-navigation-menu .fa-chevron-right{
display:none;
}
.side-menu-wrapper.closemenu{
left:100% !important;
}
.side-menu-wrapper.closemenu .close-navigation-menu {
left: -40px;
}
@media only screen and  (max-width: 600px) {
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-advance-tabs.eael-tabs-vertical div.eael-tabs-nav {
-webkit-box-flex: 0;
-ms-flex: 0;
flex: 0 0 auto;
position: absolute;
width: 145px;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:last-child span.eael-tab-title {
font-size: 14px;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:last-child span.eael-tab-title span {
font-size: 12px;
}
.side-menu-wrapper ul.eael-tab-inline-icon li.eael-tab-item-trigger:first-child img {
/* width: 80px !important; */
height: 40px;
width: auto !important;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav {
position: relative;
top: 20%;
}
.side-menu-wrapper {
left: calc(100% - 155px);
width: 100%;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .elementor-widget-wrap{
padding-top:0 !important;
padding-bottom:0 !important;
}
.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-content {
position: relative;
right: -150px;
padding-right: 130px;
}
.side-menu-wrapper.opensidemenu {
left: 0;
}
.side-menu-wrapper div.eael-advance-tabs.eael-tabs-vertical div.eael-tabs-nav>ul li::after{
display:none;
}
.slider-marque marquee.slider-msrque {
padding: 0;
padding-top: 6px;
}
.slider-marque .news-updateheader h2 {
font-size: 16px;
padding: 9px 10px;
}
.slider-marque marquee.slider-msrque li a {
font-size: 14px;
}
.slider-marque {
top: -40px;
}
}
 
 
function isPrsiUrlValid(url) {
return /^(https?|s?ftp):\/\/(((([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(%[\da-f]{2})|[!\$&'\(\)\*\+,;=]|:)*@)?(((\d|[1-9]\d|1\d\d|2[0-4]\d|25[0-5])\.(\d|[1-9]\d|1\d\d|2[0-4]\d|25[0-5])\.(\d|[1-9]\d|1\d\d|2[0-4]\d|25[0-5])\.(\d|[1-9]\d|1\d\d|2[0-4]\d|25[0-5]))|((([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])*([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])))\.)+(([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])*([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])))\.?)(:\d*)?)(\/((([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(%[\da-f]{2})|[!\$&'\(\)\*\+,;=]|:|@)+(\/(([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(%[\da-f]{2})|[!\$&'\(\)\*\+,;=]|:|@)*)*)?)?(\?((([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(%[\da-f]{2})|[!\$&'\(\)\*\+,;=]|:|@)|[\uE000-\uF8FF]|\/|\?)*)?(#((([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(%[\da-f]{2})|[!\$&'\(\)\*\+,;=]|:|@)|\/|\?)*)?$/i.test(url);
}
jQuery( document ).ready(function() {
jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav').append('<span class="close-navigation-menu"><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i><i class="fas fa-chevron-left"></i></span>');
//jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').addClass('closemenu');
jQuery(".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav .close-navigation-menu .fas").mouseenter(function(){
if(jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').hasClass('closemenu-tmp')){
return false;
}
if(jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').hasClass('closemenu')){
jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').removeClass('closemenu');
}
});
jQuery(document).on("click",".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav .close-navigation-menu .fas",function(e) {
if(!jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').hasClass('closemenu')){
jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').addClass('closemenu');
jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').addClass('closemenu-tmp');
setTimeout(function(){
jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').removeClass('closemenu-tmp');
},1000);
}else{
jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').removeClass('closemenu');
}
});
jQuery(document).on("click",".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger",function(e) {
if(isPrsiUrlValid(jQuery(this).attr('id'))){
window.open(jQuery(this).attr('id'), "_blank");
return false;
}
if(jQuery(this).hasClass('isopen')){
jQuery( ".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger" ).removeClass('isopen');
jQuery( ".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger" ).removeClass('active');
jQuery( ".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger" ).removeClass('inactive');
jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').removeClass('opensidemenu');
}else{
jQuery( ".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger" ).removeClass('isopen');
jQuery(this).addClass('isopen');
if(!jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').hasClass('opensidemenu')){
jQuery('.side-menu-wrapper').addClass('opensidemenu');
}
}
});
jQuery(document).on("click",".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger.isopen",function(e) {
e.stopPropagation();
//alert('123');
});
jQuery( ".side-menu-wrapper .eael-tabs-nav ul li.eael-tab-item-trigger.active i.fas" ).click(function(e) {
alert('remove');
});
});
 
 
.fee-price-data-wrap{
text-align: revert;
font-size: 20px;
}
.pay-tution-fee-pres .field-wrap label{
display: block;
width: 100%;
}
.pay-tution-fee-pres .field-wrap br{
display:none;
}
.pay-tution-fee-pres .field-wrap span.Gender,.pay-tution-fee-pres .field-wrap  span.wpcf7-radio{
display: block;
width: 100%;
}
.pay-tution-fee-pres .field-wrap  span.wpcf7-list-item span{
display: inline-block;
margin-left: 5px;
font-size: 16px;
}
.pay-tution-fee-pres .select2-container--default .select2-selection--single{
background-color: #fff;
border: 1px solid #e7e7e7;
border-radius: 0;
padding: 10px;
height: 45px;
}
.pay-tution-fee-pres .select2-container--default .select2-selection--single .select2-selection__arrow{
height: 45px;
}
.pay-tution-fee-pres .field-wrap{
margin-bottom:20px;
}
 
 
jQuery(document).ready( function() {
jQuery("select#Pickuppoint").change( function(e) {
console.log('changed');
e.preventDefault(); 
var pickPoint = jQuery(this).val();
jQuery(".fee-price-data-wrap").html("");
if(pickPoint != ""){
jQuery.ajax({
type : "post",
dataType : "json",
url : "https://presidencyuniversity.in/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php",
data : {action: "pay_fedral_trasport_fee", pick_point : pickPoint},
success: function(response) {
console.log();
if(response.zone_code){
jQuery("#PickuppointPrice").val('₹'+response.price);
jQuery(".fee-price-data-wrap").html('<b>Price: </b><span>₹'+response.price+'</span>'); 
}
}
});   
}
});  
});
